machines.name: attacker-workstation
machines.role: Network reconnaissance workstation with scanning tools

machines.name: corporate-fileserver
machines.role: Corporate file server with multiple network services

dependencies: All three victim machines must be scanned to discover open services
Flag fragments from corporate-fileserver and legacy-telnet-host must be combined
Final flag assembly requires accessing web-management-portal with discovered credentials

scenario.title: Corporate Network Discovery Challenge
scenario.description: A security assessment of a corporate network infrastructure where participants must use network scanning techniques to discover services, gather intelligence, and piece together encrypted flag components from multiple systems.
stages: Use nmap to perform comprehensive network discovery and port scanning on all target machines
Enumerate services and gather information from FTP, SSH, SMB, Telnet, and SNMP services
Extract and decrypt flag fragments from the corporate file server and legacy system
Access the web management portal using discovered credentials to retrieve the final flag piece
Combine all flag components to solve the complete challenge
